articles.description: Apple has added a web portal where Apple Card users can pay their bills and manage their cards online instead of requiring that they use the Wallet app (which was previously the only way to manage the card).
articles.content:
Somehow, this took almost a year to add
Apple has introduced a new web portal for managing its Apple Card credit card (including paying bills, viewing the current balance, and seeing past bill state… [+1121 chars]
